document.description: Why that number? by Andy B has left AB on October 4th, 2011 ... Do you consider it stealing if you take more than one napkin (say 10) at a fast food restaurant?

Robbery. Property, law, stealing, sentencing, punishment, history, force,... Questions and answers about robbery Sort questions by: Choose One Date asked Most liked Random Questions. 158 questions about Robbery.

How many times have you been robbed in your lifetime and how old are you if wish to share your age? by Ellis on June 18th, 2012 | 3 people like this | 12 answers | in Robbery
by Anonymous on December 31st, 1969 | no answers | in
What is your foolproof plan of the perfect bank robbery? I have the answer, but I will never tell it on a social website. by john pennington on June 12th, 2012 | 2 people like this | 4 answers | in Robbery
Has anyone in your town ever gotten shot during robbery because he or she had no money to give gunman? by Secretive Woman on May 29th, 2012 | 1 person likes this | 2 answers | in Robbery
What would you do if a burglar breaks into your house? Would you throw a chair at the burglar and call the police? by cp10225 on April 30th, 2012 | 6 people like this | 12 answers | in Robbery
Are you threatening me? by FartyMcFart on April 28th, 2012 | 1 person likes this | 4 answers | in Robbery

An I guaranteed my house won't get robbed again if I get a high tech security alarm? by Shaun on April 10th, 2012 | 1 person likes this | 4 answers | in Robbery
Have you ever had your home broken into by thieves who steal copper? My home was broken into last night. Lots of damage :( by SusieQZ on February 16th, 2012 | 5 people like this | 12 answers | in Robbery

Girls: if your guy was a bank robber and he got killed, would you carry out the next robbery he was planning to do? by Kenz the Frenz on December 27th, 2011 | 2 people like this | 6 answers | in Robbery

Did someone steal your swag on answerbag? by glowworm on October 28th, 2011 | 1 person likes this | one answer | in Robbery
Do you think that if you planned for a year, you could successfully rob a bank and escape arrest? by Amorphous Blob on October 18th, 2011 | 5 people like this | 14 answers | in Robbery
If you were going to break into a storage locker, what locker number would you choose to break into first? Why that number? by Andy B has left AB on October 4th, 2011 | 3 answers | in Robbery
Should the presidents wife have her own private jet, when their going to the same location, but 1/2 hour apart? by surfbiker on October 3rd, 2011 | 1 person likes this | 4 answers | in Robbery
Do you consider it stealing if you take more than one napkin (say 10) at a fast food restaurant? by Marisa on August 10th, 2011 | 13 people like this | 26 answers | in Robbery

anyone ever stole something? if so what and why? by paigeburt on June 8th, 2011 | 10 answers | in Robbery
Do you think this robber needs to get a new profession? LMAO!! by Shemarq the Wamama on April 5th, 2011 | 1 person likes this | 6 answers | in Robbery
Do you argee with me,when I say robbing is at it's pinnacle in the last couple of years? by socialist22 on April 2nd, 2011 | 1 person likes this | 3 answers | in Robbery
Do you argee with me,when I say robbing is at it's peak in the last couple of years? by socialist22 on April 2nd, 2011 | 3 answers | in Robbery
i was intoxicated and stole from someones home but returned it what will i be charged with by katkinson on March 22nd, 2011 | 6 answers | in Robbery
What would you like to say to robbers? by AnonymousGirl on February 25th, 2011 | 4 people like this | 8 answers | in Robbery
If you ever robbed a bank, do you think it would be a good idea to use a scooter as the get away vehicle, like these dipwads? by Shemarq the Wamama on February 12th, 2011 | 4 people like this | 8 answers | in Robbery
Have you ever had your home/car/storage broken into and your things stolen? I was robbed today...kinda pissed! by Dimstar on February 1st, 2011 | 5 answers | in Robbery
he is twenty years old and got arrested for vehicle trespass, but is also being charged with a old juvenile robbery case is this possible? by dimples19 on January 28th, 2011 | 2 people like this | 3 answers | in Robbery
I stole a gold necklace from my boyfriend, I sold it, I feel so guilty about it, I didnt have any money.I want to tell him but im scared. by Tommo74 on January 19th, 2011 | 11 answers | in Robbery
I did something really bad, I took a gold necklace from boyfriends house, and sold it because I didnt have any money. by Tommo74 on January 7th, 2011 | 1 person likes this | 20 answers | in Robbery

Stolen Possessions by Pinguickman on November 13th, 2010 | 1 person likes this | 5 answers | in Robbery
